channel.title: Asp.net Mvc on Baywet's blog

item.title: Building DNX projects using home installed build agent (TFS, VSTS)
item.author: vbiret+blog@outlook.com (Vincent Biret)
item.description: With DNX/DNU soon to be RTM there’ll be more and more developers eagers to build and deploy ASP.NET core 1 (formerly ASP.NET MVC 5) projects. If the procedure is well described when you are using hosted agents (the ones microsoft runs for you on Azure), it’s a little more complex when you want to do it on a local agent. https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/vs/alm/Build/azure/deploy-aspnet5?f=255&MSPPError=-2147217396 On your agent’s machine you installed and updated visual studio and all the tools right?
